column1: To redesign system with bigger expenditure, I suppose to raise up the computing capability. Therefore, EC2 instance type is changed to “c5ad.xlarge”(Compute Optimized), database gets more storage for backups and Route53 adds features for getting lower latency.

Data transfer out to internet (10000 GB per month), Data transfer out to origin (1000 GB per month), Number of requests (HTTPS) (1000000 per month)

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
